name: Tom and Jerry: Shiver Me Whiskers
summary: 汤姆和杰瑞是一艘海盗船。 汤姆看到一个漂浮在水面上的地图。 鬼警告汤姆,如果地图从海中移除,诅咒将落在这艘船。 汤姆给了无论如何映射到船长未提及诅咒。Tom and Jerry are on a pirate ship. Tom sees a map that's floating on water. A ghost warns Tom that if the map is removed from the sea, a curse will fall on the ship. Tom gives the map to the captain anyway without mentioning the curse.
